Package com.example.maritimemetrics.controller

Class MaritimeMetricController

java.lang.Object
com.example.maritimemetrics.controller.MaritimeMetricController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/metrics") public class MaritimeMetricController extends Object
REST controller providing endpoints to manage and retrieve maritime metrics.

  • Method Details

    • getAllData

      @GetMapping("/all") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllData()
      Retrieves all maritime metrics data.
      Returns:
      a list of all maritime metrics

    • getAllVesselCodes

      @GetMapping("/vessel-codes") public List<String> getAllVesselCodes()
      Retrieves all unique vessel codes.
      Returns:
      a list of vessel codes

    • getAllValidDataByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/valid") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllValidDataByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves valid data for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of valid maritime metrics for the specified vessel

    • getAllInvalidDataByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/invalid") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllInvalidDataByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves invalid data for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of invalid maritime metrics for the specified vessel

    • getAllMissingDataByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/missing") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllMissingDataByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves data with missing values for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of maritime metrics with missing values for the specified vessel

    • getAllBelowZeroDataByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/below-zero") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllBelowZeroDataByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves below-zero data for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of maritime metrics with below-zero values for the specified vessel

    • getAllOutlierDataByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/outlier") public List<MaritimeMetric> getAllOutlierDataByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves outlier data for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of maritime metrics with outlier values for the specified vessel

    • getSpeedDifferencesByVesselCode

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/speed-difference") public List<SpeedDifferenceDTO> getSpeedDifferencesByVesselCode(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves speed difference data for a specific vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a list of speed differences for the specified vessel

    • getProblemFrequenciesSorted

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/problems/frequencies") public Map<String,Long> getProblemFrequenciesSorted(@PathVariable String vesselCode)
      Retrieves problem frequencies for a specific vessel, sorted by frequency.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      Returns:
      a map of problem types and their frequencies for the specified vessel

    • getProblematicGroups

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/problems/groups") public List<List<MaritimeMetric>> getProblematicGroups(@PathVariable String vesselCode, @RequestParam String problemType)
      Retrieves grouped problematic waypoints for a specified problem type in a vessel.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      problemType - the type of problem (e.g., "missing", "below-zero", "outlier")
      Returns:
      a list of grouped waypoints with the specified problem type

    • getMetricsForVesselInPeriod

      @GetMapping("/{vesselCode}/summary-metrics") public List<MetricSummaryDTO> getMetricsForVesselInPeriod(@PathVariable String vesselCode, @RequestParam String startDate, @RequestParam String endDate)
      Retrieves metrics for a specific vessel within a specified time period.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      startDate - the start date in "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss" format
      endDate - the end date in "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss" format
      Returns:
      a list of metric summaries within the specified period

    • getMedianSpeedDifference

      @GetMapping("/more-compliant") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> getMedianSpeedDifference(@RequestParam String vesselCode1, @RequestParam String vesselCode2)
      Compares two vessels based on median speed difference to determine which is more compliant.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode1 - the first vessel code
      vesselCode2 - the second vessel code
      Returns:
      a JSON object with the vessel code that has higher compliance

    • getSpeedOutliers

      @GetMapping("/outliers/speed") public List<MaritimeMetric> getSpeedOutliers(@RequestParam String vesselCode, @RequestParam double speedThreshold)
      Retrieves speed outliers for a specific vessel based on a threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      speedThreshold - the speed threshold for outliers
      Returns:
      a list of speed outliers

    • getFuelOutliers

      @GetMapping("/outliers/fuel") public List<MaritimeMetric> getFuelOutliers(@RequestParam String vesselCode, @RequestParam double fuelThreshold)
      Retrieves fuel outliers for a specific vessel based on a threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the vessel code
      fuelThreshold - the fuel threshold for outliers
      Returns:
      a list of fuel outliers
